Independence.Community of Christ Seminary: The Community of Christ Seminary at the Independence campus of Graceland University is the official and only seminary of Community of Christ. It offers one graduate degree, a Master of Arts in Religion. In addition, it collaborates with several Community of Christ ministerial education programs, including Ministerial Education and Discipleship Studies (MEADS), the Co-Missioned pastors Initiative (CPI), Congregational Leaders Workshop, and the International Leaders Curriculum (ILC).
